mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID AS "USER_NO" , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE" , COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID AS "USER_NO" , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE" , COUNT , BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE = 0
